long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CRM Alert Pro is a chrome extension that allows users to customize their desktop notification experience for Lead Connector / Go High Level.  Using the application you can set a chosen tone to alert you audibly when a notification comes into the system.  Chose a wide range of time intervals to check for notifications, and even set reminders so you keep getting notified until you acknowledge you have received the notification!
Now you can have attention grabbing alerts without downloading and installing the mobile app or paying for SMS and email notifications.

**current version works with app.leadconnector.agency, app.gohighlevel.com, and app.leadconnectorhq.com domains.

A white label version is available for your users on your unique domain.  If your are interested contact the developer to disucss.
